name: Sky Drop
description: You reach out in an attempt to lift a creature up in the air for a slamming attack. When you activate this move, make a melee attack roll. On a hit, the target is grappled. The target may use its next action to attempt a STR save against your Move DC to get free. If it does not succeed, and you maintain your concentration, you may use your action on your next turn to lift the creature into the air, dropping it to the ground for 2d10 + MOVE flying damage. Flying-type creatures or ones under the effect of Levitate, Magnet Rise or other similar abilities/moves are not damaged.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 3d8 at level 5, 4d10 at level 10, and 7d8 at level 17.

contest.effect: Temporarily stops the crowd from growing excited.
